message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. Considering its value to you, we're offering it at a special introductory price of $1200000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. This is a price that I feel is more in line with the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your perspective on the product's value. To better align with your expectations while still considering the market conditions, we would like to propose an offer of $1100000 for the product. We hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1100000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.

We appreciate your patience and understanding, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our offer to $1050000 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our initial offer and your counteroffer, aiming to find a mutually beneficial solution.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking of $1025000. This is the best I can do.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and are willing to consider it. In light of this, we propose an offer of $1037500 for the product. This reflects a slight increase from our previous offer and aims to bring us closer to your proposed price while still maintaining a fair valuation for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1037500. I'm willing to go up to $1025000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Bob. We've reviewed your latest offer and, after careful consideration, we are proposing an offer of $1031250 for the product. This figure represents a compromise between our previous offers and aims to satisfy both parties.
